TRADE_NPC_LEO_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_LEO_Exp.text: Better get it together and grow up fast.

TRADE_NPC_ELI_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_ELI_Exp.text: I'll take whatever fancy brands ya got!

TRADE_NPC_ASA_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_ASA_Exp.text: I make only trades of the finest quality.

TRADE_NPC_MON_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_MON_Exp.text: See you now the true significance of the barter!?

TRADE_NPC_W01_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W01_Exp.text: We're the talk of the town, so stop by any time.

TRADE_NPC_W02_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W02_Exp.text: I might be an apprentice, but my skills are the real deal!

TRADE_NPC_W04_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W04_Exp.text: If you want the sea's bounty, I've got the freshest stuff around!

TRADE_NPC_W06_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W06_Exp.text: No world can be without order.

TRADE_NPC_W07_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W07_Exp.text: We'll show ya the strength of our spirits!

TRADE_NPC_W09_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W09_Exp.text: I also deal in non-ticket items. No scalping allowed!

TRADE_NPC_W10_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W10_Exp.text: Supporting my family has worn me out... I need pampering!

TRADE_NPC_W11_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W11_Exp.text: Boy, do I love pollen! I wish I was covered in the stuff!

TRADE_NPC_W12_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W12_Exp.text: We are the origin of all emperors, and you may trade with us.

TRADE_NPC_W13_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W13_Exp.text: Don't try to sell me any knock-offsâ€”there's no foolin' this guy.

TRADE_NPC_W14_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W14_Exp.text: I'm just window shopping! I'm not here to make deals.

TRADE_NPC_W15_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W15_Exp.text: We have deals just for you, delivered right to your door!

TRADE_NPC_W17_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W17_Exp.text: I may only have one eye, but nothing gets past it.

TRADE_NPC_W18_Exp.speaker: UI
TRADE_NPC_W18_Exp.text: Who wants an autograph? C'mon, let's see those hands!
